title: HELP! What are the fonts for these magazine titles / logos?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140626032143im_/http:/typophile.com/files/COSMO%20LOGO_5322.gif)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140626032143im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cover_lucky_146_6282.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140626032143im_/http:/typophile.com/files/w%20logo_4841.gif)
  
Any idea what fonts are used for these magazines?
author: karanoreen

comments.content: COSMOPOLITAN is Franklin Gothic Extra Condensed.
Lucky looks like customized Helvetica (Extended/not so Extended).
Just discovered that [Michael Samuel](http://web.archive.org/web/20140626032143/http:/www.mikesamuelgraphics.com/logosbasic.html) did the W. Seems custom.
